title: Geometry plugin common definitions
description: Common definitions for Geometry plugin schemas

source.description: Source of the illumination for the eclipse (usually the Sun), a point in the frames system

sourceRadius.description: Assumed radius for the source body (with Length units)

occulter.description: Occulter for the eclipse, a point in the frames system

occulterRadius.description: Assumed radius for the occulter body (with Length units)

occulterFlattening.description: Assumed flattening for the occulter body

target.description: Observer of the eclipse, a point in the frames system
